title: Indiaâ€™s Green Hydrogen Push: What the government must focus on following the Union Budget
description: The 2024 Union Budget of India designated INR 600 crore to the National Green Hydrogen Mission, aiming to enhance green hydrogen production. Key focuses include demand creation, de-risking finance, and equitable resource use. The Mission aspires to reach a production capacity of 5 million metric tonnes per year by 2030, with significant incentives for domestic electrolyzer manufacturing.
